short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The AdsKeeper Pixel Helper is a troubleshooting tool that helps you to check your pixel implementation status.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The AdsKeeper Pixel Helper is a troubleshooting tool that helps you to check your pixel implementation status. It works in the background, scans for all events, and provides real-time feedback on the implementation.
